item.title: Unbelievable !
item.description:
Or completely awesome. Depends the needs.
=> gemini://blog.notmyidea.org/a-formerly-markdown-powered-article.gmi a root-relative link to another article => gemini://blog.notmyidea.org/a-formerly-markdown-powered-article.gmi a file-relative link to another article
### Testing sourcecode
``` Python code formatter = self.options and VARIANTS[self.options.keys()[0]] ```
### Testing more sourcecode
``` Longer Python code
def run(self): self.assert_has_content() try: lexer = get_lexer_by_name(self.arguments[0]) except ValueError: # no lexer found - use the text one instead of an exception lexer … ```
item.dc:creator: Alexis Métaireau
